greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Eigentriangle, row sums and borders = offset variations of Motzkin numbers
comment: Left border = A086246: (1, 1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21,...).Q Sum of n-th row terms = rightmost term of next row.
link: P. Barry, Invariant number triangles, eigentriangles and Somos-4 sequences, arXiv preprint arXiv:1107.5490 [math.CO], 2011.
formula: Let A = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A086246: (1, 1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 51,...) in every column; and B = an infinite lower triangular matrix with A001006, (1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21,...) as the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
mathematica: row[n_] := row[n] = Table[T[m, 0], {m, n, 0, -1}]*Table[T[m, m], {m, 0, n} ];
Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, nmax}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 07 2018 *)
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 14 2008
